title: Weekly Utah Meetup
locations: Hearthside Games, 6802 S Redwood Rd, West Jordan, UT 84084
Hearthside Games, 6802 S Redwood Road, West Jordan, UT
details: Weekly meetup on Nov 19 will be at Hearthside Games, West Jordan instead of the usual Riftgate Games in Murray, Utah. All are welcome to come learn and play Netrunner! We'll start around 6 each week.

title: Netrunner Vantage Point Release
locations: Hearthside Games, 6802 S Redwood Rd, West Jordan, UT 84084
details:
Netrunner Vantage Point Release Event is happening March 2 from 6:00 PM to 9:00 PM at Hearthside Games.

Pick up your pre-order and shop other sets and Netrunner products that night.

Pre-order now and lock in pickup: https://hearthsidegames.square.site/product/vantage-point-pre-order-for-mar-2-pickup/B76CNI4MHM5GSZOHJTOHJ7H6
